content: i have gone back to the basics with a funky twist this tank corset is so easy and fun to make and matches just about everything the slit skirt is so cool detail and the top can be worn in so many ways whatever you ll try… just lace up the slit with any matches ribbons or lace tie it with tiny bows or leave the slit as is you will wonder with always whole new look this ebook is available for download for free the pattern involves crochet skills only 7 pages 5 pics a diagram a schematic
